sentences.english: So let us seize it, not in fear,but in gladness.
sentences.chinese: 因此，让我们毫无畏惧，满心愉悦地把握命运。

sentences.english: Are you having guilty rectitude, or be afraid?
It's always a little daunting but flattering nonetheless.
sentences.chinese: 这总是让人有些畏惧感的，不过也让人高兴。

sentences.english: South Korea, in particular, dreads the cost of rebuilding the North.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是韩国，对于重建北方的花销心存畏惧。

sentences.english: I could even examine the sheaf of bills without cringing.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至可以毫不畏惧地打开那一叠账单了。

sentences.english: Doing good deeds requires self-confidence, to dispel all doubts and fear.
sentences.chinese: 为善要有自信，才能发挥不畏惧的坚定力量。

sentences.english: All that stress is caused by fear. Fear of the unknown.
sentences.chinese: 所有的压力都来源于畏惧，对未知的恐惧。

sentences.english: This is a daunting list of challenges.
sentences.chinese: 这是一堆使人畏惧的难题。

sentences.english: Facing a Jumi swordsman without even flinching.
sentences.chinese: 面对珠魅剑士连一点畏惧都没有。

sentences.english: That's one reason I don't have the same age-and-death dreads that I used to.
sentences.chinese: 这也是我不再像从前那样畏惧变老和死亡的原因之一。
你是否畏惧暴雨的抽打？

sentences.english: Are you free to have a difference of opinion with others and express it without fear?
sentences.chinese: 当和别人意见相左时，你敢无所畏惧地表达出来吗？

sentences.english: Serve the LORD with fear and rejoice with trembling .
sentences.chinese: 当存畏惧事奉耶和华，又当存战兢而快乐。

sentences.english: This includes the shy dogs and the fear biters.
sentences.chinese: 这其中包括胆怯羞愧和出于畏惧而攻击的犬只。

sentences.english: Eg. If you stick to the truth, you've nothing to fear.
sentences.chinese: 你要是坚持真理就可以无所畏惧。

sentences.english: A man who dreads trials and difficulties cannot become a revolutionary.
sentences.chinese: 畏惧审判和困难的，做不了革命。

definition: to be afraid of the consequences/restraining fear
to loathe/to hate/to abhor/see also 憎惡|憎恶[zeng1 e4]
to hate evil/see also 憎惡|憎恶[zeng1 wu4]
